turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I looking to do a pickup order for pizza from a place called Bella Luna. Can you help me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, how many pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Looking to get two large pizzas and they both need to be veggie lovers with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what type of crust would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so 2 large veggie lovers with extra cheese, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. That's fine. How long till it's ready for pickup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup at Bela Luna's in 40 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, that's great. Thanks for your help.
